how_would_you: How would you like to repost this caption?
just_use_caption: Just use the caption without media
upload_media_description: Upload your media or capture directly to create engaging AI-powered captions.
drag_drop_media: Drag & drop your media here, or click to select
supported_formats: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, MP4, WEBM, MOV (max 10MB)
upload_preview_description: Upload an image or video, or use your camera to capture a photo. Your media will appear here for editing.
